channel.title: Need help making my .jar
channel.description: I've been following the guide here on mopar and I've edited the cache link to my own dropbox link etc. However when I use JARMaker and try to run the .jar nothing happens, nothing opens or anything. If someone could help me with this I would be much appreciated, if you have teamviewer, perhaps someone could show me via that?

item.title: Need help making my .jar
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

Thi is so easy…

For inout directory en the file with all ur .class files.
Set he name to client.jar for the output directory set to ur .class files asswell
Then set the manifest name to: client
Now click jar.
Then go into ur cace files and run the client.jar

Read full topic
